bibl.title: Small Notes on Bilingual Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. P. Oxy. IV, 720 = Ch.L.A. IV, 269. - 2. P. Oxy. IV, 735 = Ch.L.A. IV, 275. - 3. P. Oxy. X, 1271 = Ch.L.A. IV, 266. - Corrections of Michigan Papyri republished or published for the first time in Ch.L.A. V: 1. P. Mich. Inv. 3296 = Ch.L.A. V, 285; - 2. Inv. 3289 = Ch.L.A. V, 291; - 3. P. Mich. VII, 463 = Ch.L.A. V, 293; - 4. P. Mich. VII, 442 = Ch.L.A. V, 295; - 5. P. Mich. VII, 538 = Ch.L.A. V, 303.
Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, Small Notes on Bilingual Papyri.
